qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems package¶

Submodules¶

qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.european_call_delta module¶

The European Call Option Delta.

class qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.european_call_delta.EuropeanCallDelta(uncertainty_model, strike_price, i_state=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.uncertainty_problem.UncertaintyProblem

The European Call Option Delta.

Evaluates the variance for a European call option given an uncertainty model. The payoff function is f(S, K) = max(0, S - K) for a spot price S and strike price K.

CONFIGURATION = {'description': 'European Call Delta', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'ECD_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'strike_price': {'type': 'integer', 'default': 0}, 'i_state': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'integer'}, 'default': None}, 'i_objective': {'type': 'integer', 'default': None}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'EuropeanCallDelta'}¶
build(qc, q, q_ancillas=None, params=None)[source]¶

Adds corresponding sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit
build_controlled(qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas=None, params=None)[source]¶

Adds corresponding controlled sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_control – control qubit
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit

qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.european_call_expected_value module¶

The European Call Option Expected Value.

class qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.european_call_expected_value.EuropeanCallExpectedValue(uncertainty_model, strike_price, c_approx, i_state=None, i_compare=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.uncertainty_problem.UncertaintyProblem

The European Call Option Expected Value.

Evaluates the expected payoff for a European call option given an uncertainty model. The payoff function is f(S, K) = max(0, S - K) for a spot price S and strike price K.

CONFIGURATION = {'description': 'European Call Expected Value', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'ECEV_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'strike_price': {'type': 'integer', 'default': 0}, 'c_approx': {'type': 'number', 'default': 0.5}, 'i_state': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'integer'}, 'default': None}, 'i_compare': {'type': 'integer', 'default': None}, 'i_objective': {'type': 'integer', 'default': None}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'EuropeanCallExpectedValue'}¶
build(qc, q, q_ancillas=None, params=None)[source]¶

Adds corresponding sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit

qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.fixed_income_expected_value module¶

The Fixed Income Expected Value.

class qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.fixed_income_expected_value.FixedIncomeExpectedValue(uncertainty_model, A, b, cash_flow, c_approx, i_state=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.uncertainty_problem.UncertaintyProblem

The Fixed Income Expected Value.

Evaluates a fixed income asset with uncertain interest rates.

__init__(uncertainty_model, A, b, cash_flow, c_approx, i_state=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • uncertainty_model – multivariate distribution
  • A – PCA matrix for delta_r
  • b – PCA offset for delta_r
  • cash_flow – cash flow time series
  • c_approx – approximation scaling factor

qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.fixed_value_comparator module¶

The Fixed Value Comparator.

class qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.fixed_value_comparator.FixedValueComparator(num_target_qubits, value, geq=True)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.utils.circuit_factory.CircuitFactory

The Fixed Value Comparator.

Operator compares basis states |i> against a given fixed level l and flips a target qubit if x >= l (or <= depending on parameters): |x>|0> –> |x>|1> if x >= l and |x>|0> otherwise.

The European Call Option Expected Value.

class qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.FixedIncomeExpectedValue(uncertainty_model, A, b, cash_flow, c_approx, i_state=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.components.uncertainty_problems.uncertainty_problem.UncertaintyProblem

The Fixed Income Expected Value.

Evaluates a fixed income asset with uncertain interest rates.

__init__(uncertainty_model, A, b, cash_flow, c_approx, i_state=None, i_objective=None)[source]¶

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • uncertainty_model – multivariate distribution
  • A – PCA matrix for delta_r
  • b – PCA offset for delta_r
  • cash_flow – cash flow time series
  • c_approx – approximation scaling factor
build(qc, q, q_ancillas=None, params=None)[source]¶

Adds corresponding sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit
build_controlled(qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas=None, params=None)¶

Adds corresponding controlled sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_control – control qubit
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit
build_controlled_inverse(qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas=None, params=None)¶

Adds controlled inverse of corresponding sub-circuit to given circuit

Parameters:
  • qc – quantum circuit
  • q – list of qubits (has to be same length as self._num_qubits)
  • q_control – control qubit
  • q_ancillas – list of ancilla qubits (or None if none needed)
  • params – parameters for circuit
